HomePage.h1: Osteopath in Lisbon – Camille Labasse, D.O
HomePage.intro: Osteopathy has its unique yet universal, scientific and philosophical, human and naturalistic way of conceiving the human being.
HomePage.welcome: Welcome to the osteopathic clinic of Camille Labasse D.O !
HomePage.h2_osteopathy: Osteopathy: a human and natural approach

OsteopathyPage.text_understand: Osteopathy diagnoses and treats mobility dysfunctions of body tissues that alter the state of health, within a general understanding of the human being. It is adapted for everyone: from babies to seniors, athletes, pregnant women, people with disabilities or chronic pathologies... The osteopathic treatment, in addition to helping solving the symptom and its cause, regulate the nervous system, reset and profoundly recharge the body.
OsteopathyPage.text_functional:
Treats functional disorders (non-pathological alteration of the functioning of one or more body systems) such as:
Musculoskeletal pain, headaches, positional vertigo, concentration disorders, tinnitus, trauma sequelae, digestive disorders, genito-urinary and menstrual disorders, recurrent infections, fatigue, stress, insomnia...
OsteopathyPage.text_pathologies: Accompanies the symptomatology of pathologies such as: fibromyalgia, osteoarthritis, Crohn's disease, irritable bowel syndrome, asthma, depression, autoimmune or oncological diseases...
OsteopathyPage.text_bio:
Camille is an accredited and exclusive osteopath. She studied 5 years full time in France, within an education that meets the european standards of osteopathy. 
She is specialized in functional techniques, also known as indirects and gentle. She keeps on studying ad learning with the best teachers, themselves pupils of the first generations of American and British osteopaths, in France: Pierre Tricot, Elisabeth Tissot, Pascal Anselin...

TraumaPage.h1: Biodynamic Osteopathy & Trauma: The Somatic Approach
TraumaPage.h2_why_body: Why does the body store trauma?
TraumaPage.text_intro:
Unresolved and biodynamic osteopathy: a somatic osteopathic approach to trauma

Here, osteopathic touch at the level of the skull regarding brain areas is used to facilitate intimate contact with the unconscious through the body. It is the body that stores, expresses, and releases trauma.
TraumaPage.text_work: In this work, the encounter with what our body holds will allow us to express the emotion that was repressed at key moments of our past, to reprocess memories, to purge the trauma, and to allow our nervous system to lastingly regulate itself.
TraumaPage.text_who: This work is adapted to anyone wishing to deepen their personal development and meet the source of certain disorders (anxiety, relational blockages, chronic stress, physical symptoms that do not find their solutions through classical care).
TraumaPage.h2_role: The role of the body in transformation
TraumaPage.text_role: The body is the key to true transformation.

ContactPage.address_note: The building has an elevator and a facilitated access for reduced mobility patients
ContactPage.contact_phrase: Feel free to book an appointment or ask any question
ContactPage.cancellation_policy: A scheduled consultation must be canceled in advance or may be charged
